Text:
Hello Uploader, I wonder if you'll add the 13 episodes?  In YouTube, it seems this series was released in 2010, it must have been sleeping somewhere for us to be seeing the show only now?

Karina is rather easy on the eye, I've never heard of her before, and apart from this series, I expect not to hear of her again.

Anyway, the animal sanctuarys are tremendous, and really, the six episodes are very exciting.  The 720p clarity is terrific.

If a fully grown male lion charged me, I might expect the dung beetles to be processing a bit of human poo!  She handles all the dramatic situations very well.

I wonder if Zimbabwe is safe enough for tourists to visit?
